author: Timothy Rapp
title: Chief Medical Officer: NFL Shouldn't Restart Without Increased COVID-19 Testing
description: The NFL's chief medical officer, Dr. Allen Sills, said the NFL would need widespread COVID-19 testing before allowing practices and games to go forward...
content:
Peter Aiken/Getty Images
The NFL's chief medical officer, Dr. Allen Sills, said the NFL would need widespread COVID-19 testing before allowing practices and games to go forward.
